Author: bakermillerfloyd
Text: I was drinking 1000-1500 calories in booze a night, I just quit on New Years and I was reeeeally hoping I'd drop a ton of weight... Nope, just my luck! I think I look smaller tho cause I'm not so bloated all the time but it's still fuckin discouraging somehow maintaining

Author: trashbabyx
Text: I do the same thing...I try to track it and not do more than four shots of vodka nightly but as I’m typing it I realize that’s a problem.  I just hate being alone with myself and I don’t feel like I can fall asleep sober anymore.  If you wanna talk about it, I’m here.  Also drinking.
